data.title: WUSTL vs. University of Missouri
data.meta_description: What’s the better school? This is an important decision…. so we created a full of between dorms, social life, costs and more between WUSTL and University of Missouri-Columbia (MU). Which will you go to?
data.text:
Differences between Washington University in St Louis (WashU) and University of Missouri-Columbia (MU)

Before we get into the nitty-gritty, let’s go through a general overview of the high-level differences between Washington University in St Louis (WashU) and University of Missouri-Columbia (MU). The table below summarizes some of the most important statistics around competitiveness, costs, etc.

Washington University in St Louis (WashU) University of Missouri-Columbia (MU) In-state Tuition $48,093 $9,509 Net Price $32,873 $16,902 Average Financial Aid $40,688 $7,219 Total Undergraduates 7032 27393 Average SAT Scores 1400 - 1550 1060 - 1300 Acceptance Rate 17 78 Location One Brookings Drive 105 Jesse Hall City Name Saint Louis Columbia

WARNINGS: Based on net price alone, University of Missouri-Columbia (MU) is the cheaper option. However, this sticker price may not adequately represent the difference in living costs between Saint Louis and Columbia. WUSTL is in a West North Central and University of Missouri-Columbia (MU) is in a West North Central - sometimes off campus meals and housing costs can dramatically vary between schools

Is Washington University in St Louis (WashU) or University of Missouri-Columbia (MU) Harder to get into? Which school is easier to get into?

If you’re looking at acceptance rate alone, then Washington University in St Louis (WashU) is more difficult to get into. However, each college is looking to fill its incoming class with a variety of students with different strengths, backgrounds, etc.

Therefore, the acceptance rate alone is not a good indicator that Washington University in St Louis (WashU) is a better school or will be more difficult for you specifically to get into. On the flipside, University of Missouri-Columbia (MU) is easier to get into based on acceptance rate alone.

You can use the below college admissions predictor to determine your likelihood of acceptance at either school.

Which is better: Washington University in St Louis (WashU) or University of Missouri-Columbia (MU)?

We’ve compared dorm life, costs, outcomes and more to provide the most complete comparison between WUSTL and University of Missouri-Columbia (MU). But, you’re smart enough to know that numbers paint a terrible picture for truly understanding what each college and community is like. And, the real answer to which school is better is: the school that’s right for you. No matter who you ask, if they know what they’re talking about, the answer is the same: the “better” school is whatever is the best fit for you personally. That’s why it’s extremely important to check out all the videos on CampusReel for each school.
